data.eml:eml: Comparison of the structure and musculature of male terminalia in the tribes Operophterini, Phileremini and Triphosini (Lepidoptera: Geometridae: Larentiinae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Schmidt, Olga (2017): Comparison of the structure and musculature of male terminalia in the tribes Operophterini, Phileremini and Triphosini (Lepidoptera: Geometridae: Larentiinae). Zootaxa 4237 (2): 347-358, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4237.2.8
